summary: Login page now includes a baby-themed visual section with static images and new CSS keyframe animation utilities, but the requested Framer Motion-based implementation and the required generated asset files are not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the Login page baby-themed animation using Framer Motion with consistent 0.5s transition timing for entrance and key motion beats, and ensure it is responsive.
missing_requirements.reason: The new animation component is plain JSX with CSS classnames (no `framer-motion` imports/`motion.*` elements). A new utils file explicitly states the app uses CSS animations instead of Framer Motion, which conflicts with the requirement. Responsiveness is partially suggested via Tailwind `sm:` classes, but Framer Motion usage and 0.5s Framer Motion transitions are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static visual assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them directly from the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The Login animation references `/assets/generated/...png`, but the diff does not show any new image files added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a centralized motion configuration file that claims the app uses CSS animations instead of Framer Motion.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly requires using Framer Motion for the new Login animation. Adding infrastructure that codifies the opposite approach was not requested and contradicts REQ-17.
